definitions.text: a game in which balls are rolled at an object or group of objects with the aim of knocking them over or moving them
(cricket) the act of delivering a cricket ball to the batsman
the playing of a game of tenpins or duckpins etc
hurl a cricket ball from one end of the pitch towards the batsman at the other end
engage in the sport of bowling
examples: My parents like to bowl on Friday nights
